p: All of the abovementioned preparations contained the same amount of milk and were designed to contain milk fat as the only source of fat and to contain similar nutrient amounts, except for the group that received skim milk, which had a lower percentage of fat. The preparations were given at breakfast at 7:00 am (250 mL) and at 3:00 p.m. (250 mL) Monday to Friday. On Friday, the children also took home the equivalent of 1 liter of milk per inhabitant of the residence of the same allocated treatment, thus allowing for the intake of 500 mL of milk/day over the weekend.
